nodes.text: In the Political Pit was a popular HoloNet political debate show which aired in the years prior to the outbreak of the Clone Wars. It featured interviews with political figures. On the date 13:4:11, the show was broadcast on Feed CWN115 at 1935, featuring a panel consisting of RCLU Chairbeing Dotswa Ween, actor Reridan Reksiss, Representative Jar Jar Binks, and a recording artist named Gaeriala Boosin.

In the Political Pit was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 51, that was published in-universe. The section that referenced the show, entitled "What to Scan," was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
